languages.text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g} scores a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g}, the target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} is reduced by −<u>({unit_stat|WarhammerBallisticSkill|bonus} + target's {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g})</u>% until the end of combat. Stacks.
languages.original_text: Когда {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}охотник за головами{/g} совершает {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}критическое попадание{/g}, цель получает −<u>({unit_stat|WarhammerBallisticSkill|bonus} + {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}ранг{/g} цели)</u>% к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броне{/g} до конца боя. Эффект суммируется.

traits.locale_text: Whenever the Hunter scores a critical hit, the target's armour is reduced by -<u>3×(Hunter's BS bonus+target's difficulty tier)%</u>.
Whenever the Hunter scores a critical hit, the target's armour is reduced by −<u>(3 × (Hunter's BS bonus + target's difficulty tier))</u>%.

Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g} scores a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g}, the target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} is reduced by −<u>({unit_stat|WarhammerBallisticSkill|bonus} + target's {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g})</u>% until the end of combat. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: Когда охотник совершает критическое попадание, цель получает −<u>(3 × (бонус ДБ охотника + уровень сложности цели))</u>% к броне.
Когда охотник совершает критическое попадание, цель получает −<u>(3 × (бонус ДБ охотника + уровень сложности цели))</u>% к броне.

Когда охотник совершает {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}критическое попадание{/g}, цель получает −<u>({unit_stat|WarhammerBallisticSkill|bonus} + {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}ранг{/g} цели)</u>% к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броне{/g} до конца боя. Эффект суммируется.

languages.text: 每当{g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}赏金猎人{/g}造成{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}暴击{/g}时，都会使目标{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}降低<u>（{unit_stat|WarhammerBallisticSkill|bonus}+目标的{g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}难度等级{/g}））</u>%，效果持续至战斗结束。此效果可叠加。
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g} scores a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g}, the target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} is reduced by −<u>({unit_stat|WarhammerBallisticSkill|bonus} + target's {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g})</u>% until the end of combat. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: 每当猎人造成{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}暴击{/g}时，都会使目标{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}降低<u>（3×（猎人的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弹道技能{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}+目标的{g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}难度等级{/g}））</u>%，效果持续至战斗结束。此效果可叠加。

每当猎人造成{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}暴击{/g}时，都会使目标{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}降低<u>（{unit_stat|WarhammerBallisticSkill|bonus}+目标的{g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}难度等级{/g}））</u>%，效果持续至战斗结束。此效果可叠加。

languages.text: Cada vez que el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}cazarrecompensas{/g} aseste un {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}impacto crítico{/g}, la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g} del objetivo se reduce en un −<u>({unit_stat|WarhammerBallisticSkill|bonus} + {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}nivel de desafío{/g} del objetivo)</u> % hasta el final del combate. Este efecto es acumulativo.
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g} scores a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g}, the target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} is reduced by −<u>({unit_stat|WarhammerBallisticSkill|bonus} + target's {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g})</u>% until the end of combat. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: Cada vez que el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}cazarrecompensas{/g} aseste un {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}impacto crítico{/g}, la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g} del objetivo se reduce en un −<u>({unit_stat|WarhammerBallisticSkill|bonus} + {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}nivel de desafío{/g} del objetivo)</u> % hasta el final del combate. Este efecto es acumulativo.

Cada vez que el cazador aseste un {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}impacto crítico{/g}, la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g} del objetivo se reduce en un −<u>({unit_stat|WarhammerBallisticSkill|bonus} + {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}nivel de desafío{/g} del objetivo)</u> % hasta el final del combate. Este efecto es acumulativo.

languages.text: Wenn der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Kopfgeldjäger{/g} einen {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritischen Treffer{/g} erzielt, wird die {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g} des Ziels bis zum Ende des Kampfes um −<u>({unit_stat|WarhammerBallisticSkill|bonus} + {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}Schwierigkeitsstufe des Ziels{/g})</u> % verringert. Stapelbar.
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g} scores a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g}, the target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} is reduced by −<u>({unit_stat|WarhammerBallisticSkill|bonus} + target's {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g})</u>% until the end of combat. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: Immer wenn der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Kopfgeldjäger{/g} einen {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritischen Treffer{/g} erzielt, wird die {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g} des Ziels bis zum Ende des Kampfes um −<u>({unit_stat|WarhammerBallisticSkill|bonus} + {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}Schwierigkeitsstufe des Ziels{/g})</u> % verringert. Stapelbar.

Immer wenn der Jäger einen {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritischen Treffer{/g} erzielt, wird die {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g} des Ziels bis zum Ende des Kampfes um −<u>({unit_stat|WarhammerBallisticSkill|bonus} + {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}Schwierigkeitsgrad{/g} des Ziels)</u>% verringert. Wird aufaddiert.

languages.text: Chaque fois que le {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}chasseur de primes{/g} porte un {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}coup critique{/g}, l'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} de la cible est réduite de −<u>({unit_stat|WarhammerBallisticSkill|bonus} + {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}niveau de difficulté{/g} de la cible)</u> % jusqu'à la fin du combat. Cumulable.
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g} scores a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g}, the target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} is reduced by −<u>({unit_stat|WarhammerBallisticSkill|bonus} + target's {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g})</u>% until the end of combat. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: Chaque fois que le Chasseur porte un {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}coup critique{/g}, l'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} de la cible est réduite de -<u>(3 × ({g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}CB{/g} du Chasseur + {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}niveau de difficulté{/g} de la cible))</u> % jusqu'à la fin du combat. Cumulable.

Chaque fois que le Chasseur porte un {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}coup critique{/g}, l'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} de la cible est réduite de -<u>({unit_stat|WarhammerBallisticSkill|bonus} + {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}niveau de difficulté{/g} de la cible)</u> % jusqu'à la fin du combat. Cumulable.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}バウンティハンター{/g}が{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}クリティカルヒット{/g}を出した時、戦闘終了までターゲットの{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}が −<u>({unit_stat|WarhammerBallisticSkill|bonus} + ターゲットの{g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}脅威度{/g})</u>%減少する。この効果はスタックする。
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g} scores a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g}, the target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} is reduced by −<u>({unit_stat|WarhammerBallisticSkill|bonus} + target's {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g})</u>% until the end of combat. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}バウンティハンター{/g}が{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}クリティカルヒット{/g}を出した時、戦闘終了までターゲットの{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}が −<u>({unit_stat|WarhammerBallisticSkill|bonus} + ターゲットの{g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}脅威度{/g})</u>%減少する。この効果はスタックする。

ハンターが{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}クリティカルヒット{/g}を出した時、戦闘終了までターゲットの{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}が −<u>({unit_stat|WarhammerBallisticSkill|bonus} + ターゲットの{g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}脅威度{/g})</u>%される。この効果は累積する。

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Ödül Avcısı{/g}, her {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritik vuruş{/g} yaptığında hedefin {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}zırhı{/g} %<u>({unit_stat|WarhammerBallisticSkill|bonus} + hedefin {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}zorluk derecesi{/g})</u> kadar azalır. Etkisi çatışma sonuna dek sürer. Etki üst üste birikebilir.
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g} scores a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g}, the target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} is reduced by −<u>({unit_stat|WarhammerBallisticSkill|bonus} + target's {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g})</u>% until the end of combat.
